docs.snippet: In the Senate yesterday, among the bills ordered to a third reading was the one to punish frauds upon laborers and others seeking employment. The Metropolitan Health bill was received from the Assembly, and a warm contest occurred as to its...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate yesterday, among the bills ordered to a third reading was the one to punish frauds upon laborers and others seeking employment. The Metropolitan Health bill was received from the Assembly, and a warm contest occurred as to its reference, which was not decided before the arrival of the hour for the consideration of the special order, the Annual Appropriation bill.

docs.snippet: In the Senate, last evening, but little was done; most of the session was consumed in the consideration of a bill to amend the Code of Procedure, and to extend the term of office of the Commissioners of the Code appointed under the act of April 6,...

headline.main: NEWS FROM ALBANY.; The Code of Procedure The Death of Mr. Halstead announced in the Assembly The Excise Laws Struggle Over the Reference of the Health Bill, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate, last evening, but little was done; most of the session was consumed in the consideration of a bill to amend the Code of Procedure, and to extend the term of office of the Commissioners of the Code appointed under the act of April 6, 1857. An amendment was finally adopted that no Justice or Judge shall sit as Referee in any action pending in any Court in which he is a Judge.

headline.main: THE WAR IN NORTH CAROLINA.; Preparations to Reduce Fort Macon Destruction of Bridges and other Property by theRebels Speedy Restoration by the Indomitable Energy of Yankee Soldiers Occupation of Beaufort A Surprise TheAmerican Flag Flying Over the Town Capture of the Abscending Collector TheEnglish Ships in Port The BlockadingFleet.

docs.abstract: Account of war in North Carolina
docs.lead_paragraph: Since it became apparent that a regular siege would be necessary for the reduction of Fort Macon, the operations for that purpose have been pushed forward with vigor by Lieut FLAGLER, under direction of Gen, PARKS. On Thursday last I came down from Newbern with the Ordnance officer, on board the steamer Union, as far as the head of Slocum's Creek ...

headline.main: PROCEEDINGS OF THE LEGISLATURE.; SENATE. ASSEMBLY.

docs.snippet: The remains of Lieut. FITZ-JAMES O'BRIEN were conveyed to the receiving vault of Greenwood Cemstery yesterday. They arrived in the City on Tuesday and were received by the Seventh Company National Guard, who promulgated the following order:
docs.lead_paragraph: The remains of Lieut. FITZ-JAMES O'BRIEN were conveyed to the receiving vault of Greenwood Cemstery yesterday. They arrived in the City on Tuesday and were received by the Seventh Company National Guard, who promulgated the following order:

docs.snippet: In the Senate yesterday, the bill to incorporate the Brooklyn Loan Association was reported favorably; also, the bill to authorize the payment of bonds created in this City for the National defence. A bill to incorporate the New York Exchange Company...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate yesterday, the bill to incorporate the Brooklyn Loan Association was reported favorably; also, the bill to authorize the payment of bonds created in this City for the National defence. A bill to incorporate the New York Exchange Company was introduced, read a third time by unanimous consent, and passed. The bill providing for the diminution of Taxes in this City, by applying for that purpose the surplus revenue, was also passed.

docs.snippet: The title to this little volume scarcely prepares the reader for the merit of its content, nor does the timid, self-distrustful language of its dedication to Prof. LONGFELLOW give any earnest of the power that is latent beneath it. Sybelle is a...

headline.main: NEW PUBLICATIONS.; SYBELLE, AND OTHER POEMS. By L. New-York: CARLSTON, Publisher, No. 130 Grand-street, (late RUDD & CARLETON.) 1862.

docs.lead_paragraph: The title to this little volume scarcely prepares the reader for the merit of its content, nor does the timid, self-distrustful language of its dedication to Prof. LONGFELLOW give any earnest of the power that is latent beneath it. Sybelle is a beautiful creation. A young girl, in a seclu sion that is almost solitude, pants for the great outer world and its raging conflicts of passion and ambition.

docs.snippet: The United States steam-gunboat Mohawk, Commander JAMES II. STRONG, arrived at this port last evening from Key West, which port she left on the 1st inst.

headline.main: NEWS FROM KEY WEST.; Arrival of the United States Steam-Gunboat Mohawk The National Troops in Good Health.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States steam-gunboat Mohawk, Commander JAMES II. STRONG, arrived at this port last evening from Key West, which port she left on the 1st inst.
